logo.name: EDGAR Logo
logo.description: The official logo of the EDGAR Query website.

sections.title: Streamline Your SEC Filings Search
sections.subtitle: Effortlessly Access EDGAR Filings
sections.name: header
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to EDGAR Query, your go-to platform for seamless access to filings from the EDGAR website. **Start your search now!** Enter a Form type and get instant results.

images.name: EDGAR Main Image
images.description: A compelling image representing digital financial data analytics.

sections.title: About EDGAR Query
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content: EDGAR Query is dedicated to simplifying your access to SEC filings by integrating advanced API technology. Our mission is to provide you with accurate and real-time data, making your search for financial documents efficient and user-friendly.

images.name: About Background
images.description: Abstract image symbolizing connectivity and data.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Real-Time Search**: Instantly access SEC filings as soon as they are available.
- **Customizable Queries**: Enter specific Form types to filter your search results according to your needs.
- **Data Visualization**: View results in a comprehensive table format and export as desired.

images.name: Services Infographic
images.description: Infographic illustrating the step-by-step process of using the service.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.subtitle: Easy Steps to Get Started
sections.name: how-it-works
sections.label: How It Works
sections.content:
1. **Input Your Query**: Enter your desired Form type in the input box.
2. **Submit**: Click submit to initiate the query.
3. **View Results**: The table of filings is displayed, offering various options to explore the data further.
4. **Download & Export**: Easily download results for offline use or further analysis.

images.name: Process Flow
images.description: Graphic showing the query process from input to result.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: We're here to help
sections.name: contact
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
For inquiries or support, please reach out to us:
- **Email**: support@edgarquery.com
- **Phone**: +1 (555) 123-4567
- **Address**: 123 Financial Ave, Suite 100, New York, NY, 10001

**Follow Us** on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/edgarquery) and [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/company/edgarquery) for updates.
